Subject: Live To Fight Another Day
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Epyon::

He turned the events over in his head, and came to a decision.
If this was a full surrender he would fight and die with honor, but this
was a cease fire, a stratagie to live to fight later. And as a starship
captain, he saw where Iron Raptor was coming from.
He walked over to where Prowl, Kluster, and IR were.
"I agree with you now. If any of my troops arrive, they will stand down
also."
